title: [Timothy Albee,Steve Warner,RobinWood]Essential Lightwave 3D 8 T
description:
LightWave 3D is one of the most powerful and popular tools for creating computer graphic imagery, animation, and visual effects. This update to the best-selling Essential LightWave 3D 7.5 introduces you to the incredible new tools available in LightWave [8] and expands upon LightWaveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s existing feature-rich toolset. Get up and running quickly with straightforward, easy-to-follow tutorials. Learn industry-proven techniques for modeling and animation. Discover the secrets of creating special effects quickly and easily. Expand your knowledge of splines by building a feature-quality head model. Imbue your objects with real-world physical properties using LightWave [8]Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s new hard, soft, and cloth Dynamics. Explore the basics of character animation using inverse kinematics, forward kinematics, and IK Booster. Delve into SasLite to simulate hair, fur, and grass.

Publisher: Jones & Bartlett Learning (January 25, 2005)
